thread.title: Summit on healthy schools held in Saratoga Springs
thread.title_full: Summit on healthy schools held in Saratoga Springs - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Summit on healthy schools held in Saratoga Springs
text:
SARATOGA SPRINGS, N.Y. (AP) - A summit on healthy schools is being held in Saratoga Springs.
Organizers of the all-day event on Tuesday want to promote environmentally safe schools and programs that support that goal. Participants will discuss indoor air quality and asthma management, among other topics.
The scheduled keynote speaker is federal Environmental Protection Agency Regional Administrator Judith Enck.
